EmailTemplate.name: Marketing Refer Out
EmailTemplate.subject: Can Not Admit. Please Refer Out.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The following patient can not be admitted. Please refer out. Thank you FIRST NAME: {!Lead.FirstName} LAST NAME: {!Lead.LastName} PHONE: {!Lead.Phone} STATE: {!Lead.State} SOURCE: {!Lead.CTM_Source__c} INSURANCE COMPANY: {!Lead.Insurance_Company_Name__c} INSURANCE PHONE: {!Lead.Insurance_Phone__c} MEMBER ID: {!Lead.Member_ID_Number__c} GROUP #: {!Lead.Group_Number__c} OON DED: {!Lead.Deductible_Out_Net__c} MET: {!Lead.Deductible_OON_Met__c} IN NET DED: {!Lead.Deductible_In_Net__c} MET: {!Lead.Deductible_Met_In_Net__c} OOP OON: {!Lead.Out_Of_Pocket_Max_Out_of_Network__c} MET: {!Lead.Out_Of_Pocket_Met__c} OOP IN NET: {!Lead.Out_Of_Pocket_Max_In_Network__c} MET: {!Lead.OOP_Met_In_Net__c}
